name: Spicy Tomato Bisque with Grilled Brie Toast
author: amanda1432
summary: Nothing's more comforting than grilled cheese and tomato soup.  This is a gussied-up version, with grilled Brie cheese sandwiches and spiced tomato bisque with basil.  As the soup soaks into the sandwich, break into pieces with your spoon and ladle up with the soup.
ingredients: ⅛ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper
directions: Preheat the oven or a toaster oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
Spread the Brie cheese onto two slices of bread, and top with remaining slices
Place on a baking sheet and toast in the oven for about 8 minutes, turning once halfway through
Cut in half, and set aside
In a saucepan over medium heat, stir together the tomato puree, red pepper flakes, black pepper, basil, and sugar
Bring to a simmer, and cook for 10 minutes
Whisk in the cream cheese until well blended, then stir in the milk
Heat through without bringing to a boil
Stir in the fresh basil, and remove from the heat
To serve, place each sandwich half into a separate bowl
Ladle soup over each one into the bowl
